name: Super Kigurumi Zone - Gameboy
description:
Super Kigurumi Zone is a small Gameboy game about observation. It combines brain age style gameplay with a scooby-doo-like chase scene (and maybe some school-trip antics)

Install instructions

To run a .gb file, you will need an emulator. A popular emulator is VisualBoyAdvance. To make it work on real hardware, you can also run it on a flash cartridge such as the EverDrive.
